summary: The module supplies a collection of helper utilities for ingesting MASTR XML files into a relational database. It includes functions for preparing tables, adjusting column names and types, cleansing bulk data, handling XML syntax issues, and performing the actual write operations using pandas and SQLAlchemy.
business_intent: To automate the extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) of MASTR market data from XML sources into a structured database, enabling downstream analysis and reporting.
